content: As one of my mentors always said … “so many traps for the unwary, so many traps.” The tax code, albeit hated by many, is a wondrous jigsaw puzzle providing many taxpayer opportunities; the more nuanced of which are more confidently identifiable by the well trained. I am sorry for your loss. As you already seem to be, in future consider engaging a highly skilled tax practitioner (expert) and use your new found “free time” to dive deeper into your own subject matter specialty — driving heretofore unattainable accretive value for you own account. According to sound economic theory this approach will be more beneficial to all interested parties. Thanks for the post. Cheers!
